name: Point Reyes National Seashore
description: 71,000-acre park boasts a visitor center, hiking trails, expansive beaches & panoramic water views.

name: Salt Point State Park
description: Scenic, rocky coastline featuring panoramic views, hiking trails & secluded coves, plus campgrounds.
restrictions: No marine life foraging allowed, this is a marine protected area
bagLimits: 3 pounds of mushrooms, per person, per day

name: Golden Gate National Recreation Area
description: Coastal urban park with historic sites & activities from bicycling to hiking to water sports.
restrictions: No foraging of any kind in Muir Woods National Monument
bagLimits: Plums, apples, figs, and blackberries may be gathered in quantities of less than one quart per person per day
